words.defineVi: kỳ lạ, đặc biệt, hoặc bất thường trong một cách thú vị hoặc hấp dẫn

examples: They need hauling over the coals to explain their actions and why they have such a cosy relationship with the estate now.
That, you know, are really cosy.
Yeah it actually sounds kind of cosy.
And we've been busy making preparations to keep this little mink warm and cosy.
We just pulled the little baby bettong joey and I am going to weigh him, so I'm gonna go ahead and put him in the pouch, bed him down in there so he feels nice and cosy.
words.defineEn: (of a place) making one feel relaxed and secure
words.defineVi: (của một nơi) làm cho một người cảm thấy thoải mái và an toàn

words.defineEn: excessively delicate or affected
words.defineVi: quá tinh tế hoặc bị ảnh hưởng
